name: DireSnooze
description:
You are in dire need of sleep! The goal is to get enough sleep before your work shift is over! But be careful your boss will check in on you from time to time. Make sure to stop snoozing before your boss enters the office, since you don't wake up right away.

DireSnooze is a very small game I programmed and made art for during the weekend.

Controls:

Snooze: Spacebar

_____________________________________________________

PROGRAMMED BY: Andrich Laker

ART BY: Andrich Laker

FONT BY: Thaleah

MADE IN: Unity 2020
